webscript.description:
Update metadata for an Account - eg. file quota

The body content should have the form: 

   {
      "fileQuota" : "quota",
      "siteCountQuota" : "siteCountQuota",
      "personCountQuota" : "personCountQuota",
      "personIntOnlyCountQuota" : "personIntOnlyCountQuota",
      "accountTypeId" : 42,
      "enabled" : false
   }
where all of these data values are optional. The accountTypeId must correspond to a recognised account type id, or a 400 response will be given.
